description:
Distribution Center (DC)

Shimano North America Holding, Inc. is a global company that offers the world's sporting community top labels and brands, including Shimano, G. Loomis, Power Pro, and Lazer Sports.

We are seeking a Shipping Clerk to join our team!! At Shimano, we welcome your talent, innovation, and enthusiasm.

We offer an exceptional array of employee benefits and incentives and are proud to support our employees' health and happiness. We offer paid time off, medical, dental, vision, employer-matching 401k, wellness incentives, a fully equipped onsite gym, rideshare program, and much more.

Job Summary

The Shipping Clerk verifies and keeps records on incoming and outgoing shipments and prepares items for shipment.
responsibilities:
Use shipping software and automation equipment.
Stack products on pallets correctly.
Prepare, match, and verify shipping information and manifest accurately.
Assist with stretch wrapping, loading trucks, and all other tasks directed by Supervisor.
Adhere to customer shipping guidelines and the preparation of shipping information and manifest.
Adhere to strict Shimano's 5S Principles.

qualifications.required: High school diploma or GED equivalent
qualifications.preferred: Experience working in a warehouse/distribution center preferred.

skills: Good verbal and written communication skills
Ability to work and multitask in a fast-paced warehouse environment focusing on customer satisfaction
Ability to work under pressure and within time constraints is required.
Must be able to stretch wrap product on pallets properly.
Ability to use shipping software and automation equipment and perform a task in accordance with Shimano's standard operating procedures and customer guidelines.
benefits: Paid time off, medical, dental, vision, employer-matching 401k, wellness incentives, a fully equipped onsite gym, rideshare program, and much more.
